transcript: - Good morning! It is very early. It's probably about 6:30 a.m., I'm waiting for my sister and my friend Nick who is helping me film. We are heading to CES. We're driving, because we have so much equipment, most of which I haven't packed yet, so I have 30 minutes to pack, wait for my friends, and then we leave. I only slept for probably two hours and now we have to drive four hours. It's also raining, there's supposed to be flash floods. What a great time to drive to Vegas! But the problem is usually if you fly, there's delays, so by the time you end up packing, driving, and getting to Vegas, you end up saving time! So, let's see if we'll save time. Let's finish packing. Do you think this is all gonna fit? - Yeah, I think we'll be good! We have tons of room! - Do you know what else I have? - Yes! The Vegas tokens! - I've had these for over a year. - You're illegally parked, are you staying in the car? - [Justine] I guess so. - Okay. - [Justine] Okay, well I'm gonna have to pass the vlog off to you. - What am I doing? - [Justine] You're vlogging right now. - Hi, I'm vlogging. - You gotta get a close up of her getting the coffee. - [Nick] Oh. - And you know, like B-roll shots. - [Nick] Okay, got it. - You can do this. - Prepping Nick for vlogging. - Oh, gosh. - Alright, it's honestly gonna take two seconds, Did you mobile order? - Yes. - [Nick] Okay, I'm gonna vlog. - [Beggar] You got five or ten dollars, twenty dollars? Do you want to give up the camera? - [Nick] Sorry buddy, no. (laughs) I'm a vlogger, I'm vlogging. So wait you just pick it up, what are you doing? - Oh wait, yeah here! - Oh you guys live in the future. - Well that was not smart. - [Nick] Been workin' it. Here, let me help. - You can have this one. - [Nick] Want me carry the bag? Vlog door opened. Mam? - How's the vlog. - [Nick] Hey, I crushed it. - I ripped the bag in half. - I have a lot of drinks. - Yeah, you're really making a lot of stops. This is super heavy. - [Justine] Play top hits. - [Phone Voice] Here are the latest top songs. - I bet these are all going to be trash. - [Jenna] Yep, let's go guys. - To Vegas we go. four hours 21 minutes, it is what time? 7:49, let's see how long it takes us to go for our first pee. - [Jenna] I'm going to guess 45 minutes. - Ew! Why is my turn signal still on? - [Jenna] Oh, boy. - Whoops! We have two hours 11 minutes left. We obviously are making, are we making good time? What do you think? You guys gotta pee? Who wants to pee? - [Nick] That's me. - You gotta pee? - [Jenna] Well, we can't pee at the LMO. - There's gotta be something over here, right? - [Jenna] But there's no coffee at the LMO. - [[Justine] Then Google a Starbucks. - [Jenna] There's Denny's. - [Justine] We're going to find-- - [Jenna] LensCrafter! - [Nick] I could go for a Moons Over My Hammy. - I love LensCraft-- There's a Starbucks, there's a Starbucks! We should definitely stop over. - [Jenna] You have a red light, just so you know. - [Nick] In and out, just joking. - Did you? - It's 10. - Did you wanna snack? - I'm sorry? - Did you wanna burger? - Aw! - Let's just go in. - [Jenna] That's compact. - This is the second time I've parked illegally today. - [Justine] Wide vehicle. - Nothing can see us. - [Jenna] Pretty much. - Mam. - [Justine] Hi, thank you so much! - Hi mam. - I need my pack. So this is what I'm vlogging with. I decided to vlog with the a7S Mark II, because I'm going to CES, so I really want my videos to be the best quality that they can be. Are you actually getting something? I don't think I want anything. Let's just go. So we basically just came in here to pee and that's it. - Oh! Speak sister. - Well, we're listening to Third Eye Blind, I have to pee very, very badly. We will be there in 12 minutes, and we made pretty good time. - [Jenna] Yeah, we did. - Honestly. Trivia? - [Jenna] Triv's. - Use my code: Ijustine. Is that the one that has naked ladies on it? - [Justine] Let's see. - [Jenna] Oh God. (car pings) - I know! I know. - [Jenna] Okay, are there naked ladies? - Ew, I don't know, take a peak! No. Potential. - [Jenna] Are you going to put nudes on that nude truck? - Hey guys! We made it to Vegas and we spent, how long in line? Oh, about an hour and a half in line for FedEx. I was waiting for a package. I ordered a hard drive because I wanted to back up all of my footage onto one drive before the whole CES trip. I also ordered some things from Bloomingdale's, which was supposed to get shipped to my house, but it was delayed because of the weather. So I just rerouted it to Vegas, thought it'd be no big deal. After waiting for an hour and a half for what I thought was a hard drive, the only thing that I got was this black basic sweat shirt, that I'm wearing right now. It was crazy. It was like-- I probably should have turned this TV off while I was vlogging, because it's right by the microphone, so it's almost like, have I've ever vlogged before? Don't know. So weird! - It's the Scott-ery brothers. - I'm lookin' to replace my brother with someone with a better beard. - Yes! - So, hired! I'm actually your new HQ host. - I need stilts next to this guy. - [Justine] Are you an HQ D? - You know, I kind of am. And then if he's under the weather, Look it, perfect fit. It's a perfect fit. - Even my hands. - Yeah. - This is incredible. I want to host one day. Hopefully I can. Do you think they would let me? - Justine, when you grow up, you can host HQ. - Okay, I'll be-- - When you answer all the questions, that's the prize, you get to host. - I can't even get past question five, and I have 10 thousand extra lives, like that's sad. - 10 extra lives, it's crazy! - It's pretty crazy. And Geoff's here. Hello. - What's up guys? - And we got Nick and Jenna. - Hey guys! - What's up? - Hello everybody. - So full. - So this is the end of basically our day one vlog, traveling here. Leave it in the comments below. And maybe you will see my friends. - Oh yeah, here's my other impression of a vlogger. Leave a comment below. Let me know how you feel. Check it out.
